## 0.18.0 (2021-03-03)

## 0.17.2 (2021-01-06)

### New features

The package now also exports a CommonJS module.

## 0.17.1 (2021-01-02)

### Bug fixes

Fix a bug in `Text.replace` where deleting the entire document would produce an invalid instance.

## 0.17.0 (2020-12-29)

### Breaking changes

First numbered release.
